text: avarute pitav avareat kalpicca vidhattil avar pravesiccappeal allahuvinkal ninnuntakunna yateannum avaril ninn tatukkuvan addehattin kalinnirunnilla. ya'akhubinre manas'siluntayirunna oru avasyam addeham niraverri enn matram. nam addehattin pathippiccukeatuttittullatinal tirccayayum addeham arivullavan tanneyan‌. pakse manusyaril adhikaperum ariyunnilla
